Comment: ***From Rolling Stone’s Nikki McCann Ramirez:***  A federal judge in Texas has ruled that the Trump administration’s invocation of the Alien Enemies Act in order to deport undocumented migrants without due process is unlawful because the act is predicated on an organized, armed act of war, or other violent action against the United States — none of which are currently happening.  Read more: [https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-news/trump-judge-rules-alien-enemies-act-deportations-unlawful-1235329563/](https://www.rollingstone.com/politics/politics-news/trump-judge-rules-alien-enemies-act-deportations-unlawful-1235329563/)
Author: rollingstone
